## RateLimiter

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/ratelimiter.ts" sourceLine="91" packageName="commandkit" />

Rate limiter implementation that enforces request limits per key.
Supports configurable request limits and time intervals.

```ts title="Signature"
class RateLimiter {
    constructor(maxRequests: number = DEFAULT_MAX_REQUESTS, interval: number = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT, storage: RateLimitStorage = new MemoryRateLimitStorage())
    setStorage(storage: RateLimitStorage) => ;
    getStorage() => RateLimitStorage;
    limit(key: string) => Promise<boolean>;
    getRemaining(key: string) => Promise<number>;
    getResetTime(key: string) => Promise<number>;
    reset(key: string) => Promise<void>;
    getConfig() => Omit<RateLimitOptions, 'storage'>;
}
```

Creates a new rate limiter instance
### setStorage

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(storage: <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/rate-limit-storage#ratelimitstorage'>RateLimitStorage</a>) => `}   />

### getStorage

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/rate-limit-storage#ratelimitstorage'>RateLimitStorage</a>`}   />

Gets the storage implementation for the rate limiter
### limit

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

Checks if a request is allowed for the given key and increments the counter if allowed
### getRemaining

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;number&#62;`}   />

Gets the remaining requests allowed for a given key
### getResetTime

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;number&#62;`}   />

Gets the time until the rate limit resets for a given key
### reset

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Resets the rate limit for a given key
### getConfig

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => Omit&#60;<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/rate-limit-options#ratelimitoptions'>RateLimitOptions</a>, 'storage'&#62;`}   />

Gets the current configuration of the rate limiter
